oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mill at Loyston, Tenn. before being moved to site below Norris Dam
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frykholm, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For current rights information, please visit: http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001200
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a photograph of the mill in Loyston, Tenn. before being moved to site below Norris Dam. Loyston was flooded by the T.V.A. dam.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civilian Conservation Corps (U.S.)
Water mills.
Tennessee Valley Authority and "grass roots democracy" .
Nature and Environment.
